summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 顯示和格式化資料欄位的方式。

span.span: Specifies how data fields are displayed and formatted by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將此屬性套用至資料欄位時，您必須遵循的指導方針屬性的使用。When you apply this attribute to a data field, you must follow the guidelines for the use of the attributes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 動態資料的指導方針](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Guidelines](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192). ## Examples 請參閱線上這項功能的範例：[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute)。See an online example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute). 下列範例示範如何使用自訂資料欄位的格式。The following example shows how to use the to customize formatting for a data field. 此範例會執行下列步驟：The example performs the following steps: - 實作中繼資料的部分類別和相關聯的中繼資料類別。Implements a metadata partial class and an associated metadata class. - 在相關聯的中繼資料類別，它會套用屬性來指定下列結果：In the associated metadata class, it applies the attribute to specify the following results: - 空白資料欄位時，顯示 「 [Null]"的文字。Display the text "[Null]" when a data field is empty. - 地區設定特定的貨幣格式顯示貨幣資料。Display currency data in locale specific currency format. - 以簡短格式 (mm/dd/yy) 會顯示日期資訊。Display date information in short format (mm/dd/yy). 這個格式也適用於在編輯模式。This format also applies in edit mode. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#1)] 若要編譯此範例，您需要下列項目：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更新版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - 有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 如需如何下載並安裝 SQL Server 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱[Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 請確定您已安裝範例資料庫，您所執行的 SQL Server 版本的正確版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 資料驅動網站。A data-driven Web site. 這可讓您建立資料庫和類別，其中包含要自訂的資料欄位的資料內容。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.

summary.span: 取得或設定欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the field value.

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的值會顯示在物件。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果屬性未設定，該欄位的值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[格式類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). > [!NOTE] > 當屬性是`true`，欄位的值是 HTML 編碼成其字串表示，再套用格式化字串。When the property is `true`, the value of the field is HTML encoded to its string representation before the formatting string is applied. 對於某些物件，例如日期，您可能想要控制物件的格式化字串的顯示方式。For some objects, such as dates, you might want to control how the object is displayed with a formatting string. 在這些情況下，您必須設定屬性`false`。In those cases, you must set the property to `false`. 根據預設，格式字串套用至該欄位值，其中包含資料繫結控制項時，才物件處於唯讀模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要為編輯模式時，請將格式字串套用至欄位值中，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to field values when they are in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含該欄位值的預留位置。The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式化字串"項目值: {0}"，欄位的值用來替代 {0} 預留位置當字串出現在物件。For example, in the formatting string "Item Value: {0}", the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the object. 格式化字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The remainder of the formatting string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式化的字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用屬性來設定資料欄位的顯示格式。The following examples show how to use the property to set the display format of data fields. 第一個範例會設定貨幣類型資料欄位的顯示格式。The first example sets the display format for a currency type data field. 第二個範例會設定日期類型資料欄位的顯示格式。The second example sets the display format for a date type data field.
